headline: Will Optimism on Debt Issuance and IPOs Change S&P Global's (SPGI) Capital Markets Narrative?
summary: An analyst recently reiterated a positive view on S&P Global, arguing the company could benefit from an upswing in debt financing and a busy IPO pipeline amid lower interest rates and strong fourth-quarter 2025 issuance. This reinforces S&P Global’s position as a key beneficiary when capital markets activity accelerates, given its central role in ratings and related services. We’ll now examine how expectations for increased debt issuance shape S&P Global’s investment narrative in light of...
